reviews.review_text: I feel very grateful for this Petsmart location for the way they take care of their little critters. I have visited most Petsmarts in the lower mainland and I often saw little hamsters and mice running on wheels that are not only dirty but also way too small for them (it would hurt their spines). And they often lived in smelly cages (pee soaked bedding) and having only pellets (no nutrients) for food. But this Petsmart in North Vancouver provide their rodents with proper size(bigger) and clean wheels to run on, their beddings are clean, and they even give them a variety of fresh vegetables for snacks alongside pellets! I saw happy and healthy  mice exercising on the wheels and comfortably cuddling with each other today. They were so comfortable with humans(thanks to the kind people who take good care of them) they would come out and curiously sniff us. I m so happy for the animals to be taken such good care of. Thank you guys so much NV Petsmart!
We do our Yorkie grooming at PetSmart. We tried several groomers and we have settled on PetSmart for good service and value.
Great service and always make my dog feel special. Staff always helpful friendly and obviously love animals.

Hi, I had my dog in for a grooming today and I am really really really happy with the results. I got an early morning appointment at 8:15 AM so she was the first one in the door. I asked for an especially thorough de-shedding, and I can t be happier with the results. I even took her into the park just to do a quick brushing after and I barely can get anything off of her. Will definitely use Petsmart grooming from now on.
Great selection and friendly staff. I am happiest when o don t see pets up for adoption there   but If it is a good spot where they can be shown and adopted to good homes  that can t be bad.

Normally I dont write reviews for basic retail locations, but last week I felt the employees really went above and beyond to help me get a dog tag ring onto a collar. The woman at the cashier spent her spare moments, between helping customers at the till, with focused determination to get the dog tag on the collar for me. It probably took 15 minutes total but she got it on there when Im pretty sure theres no chance I ever could have. Whenever I go into this location, the staff are cheerful and very helpful.

I just want to thank the staff for being so kind. Coco was hit by a car, and she needed a special harness so I can help her walk and rehabilitate. The staff was super understanding of the situation and went above and beyond to help me. Thank you so much! You are really one of a kind.
They helped me get the kitty liter in my car. Outstanding service
The staff is very friendly and helpful. They helped me find the brand I was looking for.
Your pet store to go! Good collection for cats and dogs and other animals. Friendly staff! They got some new kittens as well.

I have a difficult Westie to groom - he hates having his feet touched -  and I am also very fussy about the cut he gets. Dariane at North Vancouver Petsmart is great on both accounts. She is very responsive to any suggestions I make (e,g, tail a bit shorter) and the price is very good.
I got my beautiful long haired syrian here. The lady who helped us with the hammies was alright but the cashier was really kind.
My betta fish was sick and one of the staff members (unfortunately I can t remember his name) patiently explained what i have to do for the fish. The fish is healthy and happy now

The grooming salon excelled today with my pug Mac. He now has a lovely soft coat, very little shedding, and is a very happy boy with his trimmed nails. Thankyou groomers, plus you always give us a great welcome
This is essentially our zoo on the way home from school. From skinny pigs (hairless guinea pigs) to fancy mice, we love holding them all.

I love this store! Nice selection of any pet foods. Staff members are really friendly. We took our dog for training. The session was 6 weeks long and Derrick - the trainer - did an amazing job! Highly recommended to everyone who need some help or simply if you need food  or accessories to your pet.

As always, great grooming and care provided for our puppy! Rachel and Isabel offered suggestions on how we can do some things at home to improve our dogs health and future grooming experiences. Feedback was welcomed, and very on point.
Had what I needed, helped with my questions and were very friendly

Ive been popping into this north van location for a few weeks now expanding my new aquarium hobby and I have found the staff here to be very knowledgeable in their area extremely kind and helpful and unlike some pet stores I have been to in the past they actually care about their animals when I first got started they wouldnt allow me to buy a new fish until they had done their very best to ensure I had everything in order to keep happy fishies including a set up check as well as a water sample test they direct me to the proper foods and have taught me how to care for my.individual fish Breeds I now have 15 fish 2 frogs 2 eels all living happily in their community tanks with their own feeding schedules and specific foods and feeding schedules I can honestly say I wouldnt have figured out half of what I now know without them and would have killed more than a few of my gill babies in trying to figure it all out on my own they have helped me create my own little ecosystems all working in partnerships to maintain their tanks 10/10 would recommend

Dee took such good care of my little pup! She is patient, thorough and gentle with the doggies!! I definitely recommend her if youre thinking of getting your dog groomed here. Her customer service was impeccable too!!!

Theyve got everything you need for your favourite critter!  Service is friendly, lots of selection. The new Pet Perks program is pretty good too, doesnt take long to get some cash back.  Grooming service is decent too. Bonus points for the great dog walk area (Harbourview Park) with a trail beginning directly behind PetSmart.. walk under the train bridge towards the water!

I love this location. It s never too busy and I ve been on very different times during the day and night. They have a great selection of pet foods toys beds and they also have cute adorable cats and kittens available for adoption which you can view. My cat only eats the Nutrience brand of food and only Petsmart seems to carry it and I usually get a 10% discount since I continue to buy it. I love this location the staff are also very friendly and helpful!

My go to pet store now that Pet Boutique has shut down. Store is very clean and has a wide variety of supplies for almost any animal. I go there for bedding for my snake primarily but also have purchased fish, hamsters, and birds from them in the past. Overall, its a great store with a fantastic and friendly staff.

My dogs love this place and the team is so good to them. The grooming services are spectacular. They ve got all the necessary treats and toys... it s like pet Disneyland. At checkout the register automatically promts me with the opportunity to donate to the PetSmart foundation. This group has funded almost every no-kill shelter and SPCA built in Canada. I appreciate a brand that actually cares. I can t see myself shopping anywhere else.
Excellent lost my wallet in parking lot and staff had it when I called in Thank God there is honest people still in the world

I had an issue with online ordering which resulted in my having to purchase a product I didnt really want.  When I got to the store the product I wanted was on the shelf.  The cashier, very  cheerfully, processed the return of the wrong product and billed me for the correct product.  Problem solved.  Staff at Abbotsford store always exemplary.
This is our cats favorite store! Always has her favorite food and treats in stock. Also, with doordash, you can get your supplies delivered for free at home. Highly recommend.

I had lots of bad experiences for grooming before, but yesterday Dee did a very clean and nice job with my little boy. She was super nice and I loved a little report card she made for Tipsy. Thank you for your service.

Very nice selection of fish tanks and tank ornaments :) the staff where very friendly as well   . . . . I felt bad for the Siamese fighting fish in the small plastic cups barely moving, theres no way thats okay or right in any way  .

This location is very clean and well organised. All the staff wear face coverings. Wide selection of pet supplies and food and there is a dog grooming department in the store. No cat adoptions at the moment, hope they return as that is always a highlight of our visit and where we got our cat.

This is a pet store.  I like turtles.  I like turtles a lot.  At this store they have various pet store related things.  I do not get spooked when I go to this store.  The opposite.  This is primarily because it is well known that animals do not have ghosts, so it is impossible for this store to be haunted.  Please remember this, and you too shall not be spooked.

This PetSmart has the friendliest and most knowledgeable staff I have met in a pet store ever. The girl who helped me had a 4 year old hamster and seemed to know what he was doing. I do quite a bit of research on hamsters  and it was really great that they know what they are doing there. Thank you pet smart!
Love me some guinea pig visits whenever I get my own guinea pig food.  Great service. Parking lot is maintained. Easy entrance and exit.  Go here now for cool pet times.
Huge selection, with great prices. Love it.
Friendly Staff I was welcomed multiple times. There is a wide variety of pet food and toys. Store is kept clean.

Fantastic Customer Service. My daughters hamster got sick 2 weeks after we bought it and the store gladly took it back, had a vet look at it and promised to treat it with medication if possible. They did it all with empathy and kindness as my 10 year old was in tears due to its recent turn for the worse. Regardless of what the final outcome is, I will purchase any future pets from this store as they stand by their products.
Rebecca is super friendly, helpful and knowledgeable and got my dogs on food that doesnt make them itchy or disinterested. They love mealtime now. Im a customer for life, thanks Rebecca.

I dont often go to PetSmart but they carry the kitty litter my cat likes for the best price.  My experience in the past has been ok but this time was particularly good.  They had Greenies on sale and also the cashier offered a $10 coupon I could use on my next purchase.  He split my items into two groups so I could use the coupon right away.  There were plenty of sales staff available if you had questions.  Also unlike some pet stores they were adopting out adult animals.  They have also added free delivery on purchases over $50 in the area!

Everything youll want for your pets needs is there. Friendly staff. Probably dont need mention this but pets are welcome to shop with you. I like how they have toys at dog height. My dog was able to pick his own toy!
Excellent, friendly and helpful service. First time visiting and looking for a dog bed, couldnt be more happy with the experience. Thankyou!

Huge shout out to Dee- wonderful groomer. She took such good care of my lil benji. Hes a rescue and doesnt take easily to people. After his grooming session on saturday -he looked so handsome and I could tell he had been treated very gently. THANK YOU DEE
The staff at the main street store are so nice! Theyre always really helpful and friendly, its a pleasure to go there. Thank you guys!
The staff were wonderful. Ended up buying an unplanned cat tree, it was half price. Pet stores are always fun

I was extremely happy with the fellow at cash who helped me and my boyfriend today, Sunday nov29th around 11:20am. I wish I caught his name but he had his kitty on his name tag, a mostly white cat with patches. Excelent service !
Great deals and savings. Good selection of cat food and toys.
Great place to shop for your pet needs. Grooming is excellent. We also were able to adopt a new kitten.
Great customer service!
Grooming services are great
I dont shop much in the retail store but I use the grooming department. Their staff there listens to how I prefer my dog to be groomed and they get it right. Highly recommended.
Was very impressed by the friendly staff. I got assistance right away, they took genuine care in wanting to help. Very satisfied with the experience and will be back.
Staff is very friendly and helpful. Can be a bit pricey for some stuff and the selection doesnt change very often but none the less a good location to visit!
Very pleased with my shopping experience for my 2 chihuahuas pedro and sagey and my 2 guinea pigs Fred and Ted! I am able to go straight to the area that I need and out the door quickly

We took our Dog Kody there to by groomed and it was a great experience for both Kody and us. As it was Kodys first time there Suzanne said she would take her time to make sure that Kody was comfortable.  He came out smiling and so happy.   Thank You Suzanne! Kody looks cuter than he ever has!!! We will  be back with Kody!!

Awesome place with staff that seem to know everything about pets, food, and the best supplies needed. Come here if either you have a question to ask about a pet or if you want to buy one or supplies. Recommended for ANYONE with pets or who wants to buy one.
The employees here are always very helpful and able to answer my questions. They take good care of the critters in their store and are quick to help me find or compare products.
I spend A LOT of time and money at this location. The staff are always so helpful and friendly, and the store is always well stocked.
Our busy terriers always come home happy and looking tidy from the Main St grooming salon.  Attentive and accommodating staff for my requests too

They have reduced the cat food brands, still have more than many other stores, also I like to buy food for my pets from petsmart because  everytime I buy there, they always donate or take care of homeless pets in reward.
Lots of good product for your pet. Manager was very helpful
The best stocked petsmart for all pets. Expecially fish and bird stuff
Overall, most PetSmadts are nice and this ones not an exception. The shelves are stocked and I can find all my cats needs in there.
Love their selection of cat food + toys + treats, easy access parking lot, friendly helpful staff and well organized shelves :)
All Pet Smart stores are consistent with 5 star service every time . We absolutely love the dog salon . Warm thanks to everyone .
Well stocked, clean store and helpful employees! There is always something for our dogs, finches and cat at fair prices.
Staff are very friendly and they have a great selection of products for your pets!
My little Loafy   loves
Amazing selection of products for your pets. Love the fish and good prices for pet training!
Always super friendly staff and a great selection. Best pet supplies option around.

Great variety of products from food to leashes; can be a little tricky to find what you need but staff are always there to point you in right direction and are very friendly with your pet if you bring it in
Super happy with PetSmart. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Willing to go out of their way and even substitute products to make you happy. Always by my pet stuff here
Organized, friendly staff, large selection. Usually shop here for my kitty
Very friendly service, clean store. I compared their prices with Amazon and they are close if not the same, so you get good value for your money.
These folks are so super compassionate and do a lot for adoption of animals and contributions to the agencies that rescue them!
Always friendly and my dog loves it
Very helpful knowledgeable staff. Plenty of fish to choose from and lots of extras to shop for my aquarium.
Product availability superb staff AR most friendly and extremely helpful if they cant answer your question they will find out the answer, wonderful customer service!!
Super nice manager and staff that really are knowledgeable in all aspects of animal needs.. very impressed
The staff at this location is great and they have good inventory and choices on hand.
Surprisingly...for a chain store, the staff is very knowledgeable. Quality is good. Fish are healthy, and good prices!
Great selection and friendly staff. We took our dog for training here and he was great!
Great store always helpful staff easily accepted returns great hamster products selection also unlike most pet shops only cary mostly cat and dog items always enjoy shopping here .
Its our go.to place.for cat food and dog treats great staff and friendly service recognized by name its like shopping in a mom and pop operation with big box prices
Best place to go for all your pet needs.  Chowder goes here regular for grooming and is always super excited when we take him.
They take good care of my girl for a nail trim!  She is absolutely terrified but they get her through it!
great staff and so much choice.. was able to find everything my new kitten needed and get a lot of info regarding my new kitten
Great service in grooming department, we are also currently enrolled in puppy training where we are learning a lot for our instructor Derrek.
Great selection of products.  Can always rely on them for getting what I need for my two pups.
Reasonably priced items, good selection, friendly sales staff, grooming services, great guarantee policy.
Bought my half moon betta fish here and he is very beautiful and healthy !
Always friendly and helpful team here and both our dogs love the cashier treats :)
I love this pet smart, their staff are very helpful, store is clean and organized. And there are always dogs inside to pet
Great petstore, employees seem experienced (Jesse was very helpful and informative!), love that you can handle the pets!
The fish selection is getting better and the knowledgeable staff is very appreciated.
Its for all my pets. I like that puppies are aloud there only thing missing is a vet on site then it would be perfect
Great selection of stuff for your animal friends. Staff are very pleasant
Whatever you might need for your pet, you will find here. I think Petsmart is the most equipped store when it comes to pets food, supplies and grooming.
Love all the Groomers there. They do such a good job with my boy Oscar!
Amazing, caring, and experienced groomers at an affordable price. Will certainly come back here routinely.
Best dog bather works here, ask for Isabel!!
They really care about animals and we had good advice on buying a pet.Thank you guys!
